ygData.messageBody:
RE: [EQ_Necromancer] New Everquest Auction Web site
I was looking at his site before this happened and the testimonials were all about how he sent the product really quick.  The content was not mentioned.  Is it any good?
 
Dominick A. Scalzo
dscalzo@...
